target.query: involvedObject.labels.name:"$service" AND involvedObject.namespace:$namespace AND type:Warning AND message:"probe failed" AND NOT message:"Startup probe failed"
involvedObject.kind:"HorizontalPodAutoscaler" AND involvedObject.namespace:$namespace AND involvedObject.name:"$service" AND NOT message:"All metrics below target"
involvedObject.kind:"HorizontalPodAutoscaler" AND involvedObject.namespace:$namespace AND involvedObject.name:"$service" AND message:"below"

panels.title: Average CPU usage & HPA CPU Target

targets.expr: (avg by(pod) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) * 100) / avg by(pod) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="heap", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"})
